orbitDisplayDescriptionOn: Show complete orbit ellipses for all loaded satellites
orbitDisplayDescriptionOff: Hide complete orbit ellipses for all loaded satellites
dayNightDescription: Enable globe lighting to render day/night
companionInfoSubtitle: This page presents a static introduction for the simulated companion satellite.
companionInfoBullet1: The companion satellite's TLE is generated once from the target TLE and the chosen distance; it is not dynamically updated.
companionInfoBullet2: The companion distance is an upper bound for the relative separation at any time (approximate; exact constraints require advanced solving).
companionInfoBullet3: The companion satellite is for simulation only and does not exist in public catalogs.
companionInfoBullet4: For richer control (phase, RAAN, argument of perigee), extend the monitoring module with advanced co-orbit solving.
companionInfoFooter: Tip: You can share this page by copying the URL from the browser address bar.
